thread.section_title: Street Smart Transmission Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Street Smart Transmission | streetsmarttransmission.com
thread.title: Tim N.
thread.title_full: Street Smart Transmission reviewed by Tim N.

author: Tim N.
title: Tim N.
text: Loved dealing with this company. They shipped my transmission fast and it arrived earlier than Quote: d. I also loved the fact that I didn't need to pay the core charge upfront and returning the core was easy. I would definitely order from them in the future if the need arises.
